HPI 8023 Nissan Skyline GT-R 1990 All-Japan Touring Car 300km Winner Place K. Hoshino/T. Suzuki

Two R32 GT-Rs were entered for it's Group A debut in the first event of the 1990 JTC series - the All-Japan Touring Car 300km race at the West Japan Circuit. The Calsonic #12 was driven by Kazuyoshi Hoshino & Toshio Suzuki and the Reebok #1 was driven by Masahiro Hasemi & Anders Olofsson. Hoshino & Suzuki went on to win the race and break the course record by two seconds getting the R32's first victory in it's first race. They also went on to win 5 of the 6 events (losing to Hasemi & Olofsson in the Race de Nippon) and became the Group A champions.
